name: $inpatient
desc: Includes requests for medications to be administered or consumed in an outpatient setting (for example, Emergency Department, Outpatient Clinic, Outpatient Surgery, Doctor's office)

name: $outpatient
desc: Includes requests for medications to be administered or consumed by the patient in their home (this would include long term care or nursing homes, hospices, etc.)

name: $community
desc: Includes requests for medications created when the patient is being released from a facility
